sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Rule in Shelley's Case Abolishment Act.

sections.heading: The rule of property known as the rule in Shelley's Case is
This Act shall apply only to wills of decedents dying after
sections.text:
the effective date of this Act and to deeds, agreements and other
written instruments executed and delivered after the effective date of
this Act.
